summary: This document contains an email exchange between Jes Staley and Tom Pritzker discussing a family restructuring deal. The conversation touches on financial strategies, including recapitalization and tax considerations, indicating a business relationship between the two individuals.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is involved in a discussion regarding a family restructuring deal and expresses enthusiasm about the ongoing deal.

persons.name: Tom Pritzker
persons.context: Tom Pritzker discusses financial strategies related to a family restructuring deal and expresses a desire to work with Jes Staley.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Tom Pritzker are collaborating on a family restructuring deal, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange discusses a family restructuring deal involving financial strategies.
Tom Pritzker mentions the goal of pulling capital out for relatives and selling a majority stake while retaining a minority stake.
There is a reference to avoiding tax implications related to the Obama administration.
Jes Staley expresses enthusiasm about the ongoing deal.
